page.title: 05COMMUNICATIONS TELEPHONES 2
page.content: PUBLIC TELEPHONE SERVICE For people without their own telephone public telephones can be used. Also when you are out of your own home you can use these 'phones too.A charge is made for the use of these phones. A minimum of 10 pence. How to use a pay phone. 1. Lift he receiver.(removeable piece of plastic which transmits and receives sound) 2.Dial the number you want. 3.Place the money in the machine when you hear the pips. 4. you are now through to your call. 5. Replace the receiver when you have finished your "call". Acall is slang for a telephone message. *** New phones are begining to replace the old ones . In Malpas we still have the old system.
